field.value: Andrea Greenbaum is Professor of English at Barry University, where she teaches classes in professional writing, cultural studies, gender, multimedia writing, and screenwriting. She directs the Professional Writing Program. Her most recent book is Judaic Perspectives in Rhetoric and Composition (Hampton Press, 2008).
